attr.title: Candle Prick
attr.desc: Candle Prick is a crunchy pixel adventure about stabbing enemies and using them as extensions of yourself to solve increasingly complex puzzles
attr.inst:
Purchase Candle Prick from Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1920700/Candle_Prick/
Then once downloaded and installed to your library, right click it, then Manage-Browse Local Files. Then COPY "Candle Prick.pck" into the gamedata folder.
